com.orange.labs.sdk

Class OrangeCloudAPI<SESS_T extends Session>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orange.labs.sdk.OrangeCloudAPI<SESS_T>

  • public final class OrangeCloudAPI<SESS_T extends Session>
extends java.lang.Object
    Location of the Orange Cloud API functions. The class is parameterized with the type of session it uses. This will be the same as the type of session you pass into the constructor.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  OrangeCloudAPI.Entry
      A metadata entry that describes a file or folder.

    • Field Summary

      • freespace

        public void freespace(OrangeListener.Success<java.lang.Long> success,
             OrangeListener.Error failure)
        Get the available space of the current account.
        Parameters:
        success - callback returning the CloudItem (folders and its elements)
        failure - callback when error occurred

      • listFolder

        public void listFolder(OrangeCloudAPI.Entry entry,
              OrangeListener.Success<OrangeCloudAPI.Entry> success,
              OrangeListener.Error failure)
        List the content of a folder. You must call this method first to be able to access to cloud information with null to obtain root folder.
        Parameters:
        entry - folder object to list. Can be null to get the root access.
        success - callback returning a Entry (folders and its contents)
        failure - callback when error occurred

      • createFolder

        public void createFolder(OrangeCloudAPI.Entry entry,
                java.lang.String name,
                OrangeListener.Success<OrangeCloudAPI.Entry> success,
                OrangeListener.Error failure)
        Create a new folder.
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry item where the folder has to be created. If null, folder will be created in the root folder.
        name - the name of the folder to be created.
        success - callback returning the new created Entry
        failure - callback when error occurred

      • delete

        public void delete(OrangeCloudAPI.Entry entry,
          OrangeListener.Success<java.lang.String> success,
          OrangeListener.Error failure)
        Delete an Entry (files or folders)
        Parameters:
        entry - entry to delete
        success - callback when delete is completed
        failure - callback when error occurred

      • fileInfo

        public void fileInfo(OrangeCloudAPI.Entry entry,
            OrangeListener.Success<OrangeCloudAPI.Entry> success,
            OrangeListener.Error failure)
        Get more information about a file. In particular, the following information is returned: size, creation time, thumbnail and download URL.
        Parameters:
        entry - must be a file
        success - callback returning the Entry with more information
        failure - callback when error occurred

      • thumbnail

        public void thumbnail(OrangeCloudAPI.Entry entry,
             OrangeListener.Success<android.graphics.Bitmap> success,
             OrangeListener.Error failure)
        Download a thumbnail from Orange Cloud, copying it to a Bitmap object.
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry metadata. Must be a file.
        success - callback returning a Bitmap
        failure - callback when error occurred

      • preview

        public void preview(OrangeCloudAPI.Entry entry,
           OrangeListener.Success<android.graphics.Bitmap> success,
           OrangeListener.Error failure)
        Download a preview from Orange Cloud, copying it to a Bitmap object.
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry metadata. Must be a file.
        success - callback returning a Bitmap
        failure - callback when error occurred

      • imageContent

        public void imageContent(OrangeCloudAPI.Entry entry,
                OrangeListener.Success<android.graphics.Bitmap> success,
                OrangeListener.Error failure)
        Download image content from Orange Cloud, copying it to a Bitmap object.
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry metadata. Must be a file.
        success - callback returning a Bitmap
        failure - callback when error occurred

      • upload

        public void upload(java.io.File file,
          OrangeCloudAPI.Entry entry,
          OrangeListener.Success<org.json.JSONObject> success,
          OrangeListener.Progress progress,
          OrangeListener.Error failure)
        Upload a file to the Orange Cloud
        Parameters:
        file - file to Upload
        entry - unique identifier of the parent folder
        success - callback if upload is ok
        progress - callback to notify upload progress
        failure - callback to notify error
